channel.title: Zombie head help!

item.title: Zombie head help!
item.dc:creator: @eagledude4 eagledude4
item.description:
@eagledude4 wrote:

Hi everyone, Im having problems with my zombie head >=(

startAnimation(2840); //zombiehead
NPCHandler.NPCsay(“ALAS!”, i);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “ALAS!”;
println(“ALAS!”);
break;

What code do I use for the highlighted part? I’m getting an error.

Read full topic
